I'm really glad to see Yoon take off for her entertaining personality.  She works hard and deserves the attention she's getting.  I've been so impressed during shows where she also helps redirect attention to her members, very thoughtful. Wishing you all the best, Yoon!  Thanks for having her on the show, Kiu

Their chemistry is so cute. They are all very happy and comfortable talking to each other, everything is very spontaneous
